channel.title: Modify Watches: Popular Products
channel.description: A list of the popular products at Modify Watches.

item.title: Oski Face
item.description:
The Oski watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match the this design with any other straps from your Modify collection. The face is made from a scratch-resistant polycarbo..

Price: $30.00

item.title: Oski in Black
item.description:
The 'Oski in Black' comes with one Oski watch face and one Black strap. The watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match faces and straps of all styles from your Modify collection. The strap is made from a soft and comfortable silicone material and the face is made from a scratch-resistan..

Price: $45.00
